-Change permission between 'Everyone' and 'Instance Moderators'
-Network Sync Toggle
-Audio Source switch between, 'Audio Source', 'Room Scale', 'Direct' (2D)
-Reload current video at current timestamp. (Useful for Prop video players, so you can reload the current video for late joiners)
-Timestamp controls, Info and Debug pages and more!
-SponsorBlock's API integration for auto skipping sponsor segments and more! 
-Save/Load URLs from a file
-Local Video player Screen 
--Most useful when the video player in a world is in an inconvenient spot, or you just want to lay back and still watch.
--Includes options to adjust the size and toggle pickup.
-Prop Video Player Syncing
--Watches for network messages at world join and will sync prop video players if they exist

versions.name: FrameFocus
versions.author: Lily
versions.description:
FrameFocus is a computer performance enhancement game utility. This will allow you to gain a slight bit of performance while you are tabbed out of the game. When you are tabbed out, your frame rate will drop (this is to unfocusing the game, thus causing extra performance through out your computer). Once you tab back in, your frame rate will go back to normal. This mod also doubles as a frame rate unlocker of sorts. You can set a max target frame rate you would like the game to try and run at.

**Note:**
V-Sync __must__ be turned off for this mod to properly work.

Allows to start CVR with different **credentials profiles** via steam Launch Options, or straight from the commandline.

```--profile=profile_id```

I normally use this to test sync stuff (where I need 2 clients). For this, you'd need to copy CVR files to another folder, and launch together with `--no-steam` launch option. In my case would be: `ChilloutVR.exe --profile=kafeijao --no-steam`

versions.name: PickupOverrides
versions.author: kafeijao
versions.description:
Allows to override a few settings for all the pickups in the scene.

__**Auto-Hold**__ whether the pickups will stick to your hand or not, to drop a Auto-Held pickup you need to squeeze the right grip and pull the thumbstick back (both on the **right** controller even if the pickup is held on the left controller)

__**Maximum Grab Distance**__ sets the max distance you can actually grab a pickup. This is useful if you're tired of grabbing random pickups from across the world. Note: The pickups will still highlight meaning they can be tele-grabbed (the alyx style pull), but you won't be able to grab unless it is within the max distance.

Check [README.md](https://github.com/kafeijao/Kafe_CVR_Mods/tree/master/PickupOverrides) for more in-depth info.

versions.name: ServerConnectionInfo

versions.description: Shows HUD notification upon server disconnection

versions.name: MuteTTS
versions.author: Nirvash, Eric van Fandenfart
versions.description:
Allows you to use TTS directly in CVR. 
  **Only works on Windows**
  Without BTKUI the Button is in Settings -> Implementation or Home > Shortcuts    
  
  With BTKUI, has menus for, 
  * Message History
  * Saved Custom Messages
  * Canned messages (fully customizable)
  * Settings menu for adjusting config easily
  
  Also has options for,
  * Keyboard hotkey for freeform keyboard input (Default: Right Control)
  * Parameter support when mod is speaking, processing, or keyboard open
  
  See <https://github.com/Nirv-git/CVR-Mods/blob/main/README.md> for full details and instructions!
versions.changelog:
Back from the dead now that Vivox is gone and we can easily patch audio stuff with Better Better Communications!
Not too many changes, mainly patches to work with BBC and fixes to BKTUIv2

While BTKUI is the easiest way to interact with a lot of the mod, you will now find a shortcut in the Shortcuts of the Home menu and still in Settings -> Implementation

versions.name: PortableMirrorMod
versions.author: Nirvash
versions.description:
This mod allows the user to locally spawn mirrors for themselves in any world.

The mirrors can be configured to:
* Allow/disallow mirror pickup
* Toggle between full/optimized/cutout or transparent (with Solo and Combo sub modes)
* Configurable mirror size and distance from you
* Standard, 45 degree, ceiling, and  small

See <https://github.com/Nirv-git/CVRMods-Nirv/blob/main/PortableMirror_Combined/README.md> for full details
versions.changelog: Prevents grabbing objects when holding a mirror with Custom Grab - Fixed for R175

versions.name: CCK.Debugger
versions.author: kafeijao
versions.description:
The Content Creation Debugger allows you to debug `avatars`, `props` and `misc`.

__**Menu**__ - Menu that displays useful information like:
- Avatar and Props `synced`/`local` parameter values
- Prop Pickups and Attach Info
- Avatar & Props Pointers/Triggers detailed info
- Avatar animator layer playing clips

__**Visualizers**__ - Toggleable Component visualizers:
- Pointers and Triggers 3D shape
- Trigger `OnEnter` (green), `OnExit` (red), `OnStay` (yellow) events
- IK bones
- FBT Trackers

Supports [BTKUILib](https://api.cvrmg.com/v1/mods/download/113) to restore the menu position or completely hide it.

Click [here](https://github.com/kafeijao/Kafe_CVR_Mods/tree/master/CCK.Debugger) for a more **in-depth** readme (with pictures).
versions.changelog:
- Fixed for 2024r176
- Added a setting to disable the menu entries from being collapsible (this will probably cause massive lag but NAK asked)
- Fixed menu reloads using F5 from killing the menu

versions.name: Increase Dissonance Audio Buffer
versions.author: happysmash27
versions.description: Fixes the bug where one sounds like an air conditioner at low framerates, by increasing the Dissonance audio buffer sample amount (16 at the time of writing) to (by default) 1024. This allows Dissonance to send much smoother, less glitchy audio, since it does not keep running out of space to store it.
versions.changelog:
- Added a more flexible code path that will modify ALL instantiations of Dissonance.Audio.Capture.BufferedSampleProvider that have their last argument multiplied by some number, instead of just the ones multiplied by 16.
- Added an option to enable or disable this new flexible code path, where if it is not enabled it will only modify an instantiation if it is multiplied by 16 specifically. Currently flexible code path is enabled by default.
- Configuration and logging has been somewhat improved in the source code.
- Default target audio buffer size has been increased from 256 to 1024.
- Initial CVRMG release.

versions.name: CoherentLoadFix

A mod that fixes Coherent Gameface's native imports

versions.name: OSC
versions.author: kafeijao
versions.description:
This mod enables interactions with ChilloutVR using OSC. It also focus on compatibility with existing applications. If something is not working create an [issue in github](https://github.com/kafeijao/Kafe_CVR_Mods/issues) and I will fix it asap.

__**Avatar**__
- Change into new avatars
- Change/Read parameters
__**Inputs**__
- Control your avatar
- Send actions to the game
__**Props**__
- Set/Read prop location
- Set/Read synced params
__**Tracking**__
- Listen to tracking data (location/battery) from `Trackers`, `Controllers`, `HMD`, `Base Stations`, and `Play Space`.
__**ChatBox**__
- Send ChaBox messages and typing events

__**New**__ [python library](https://github.com/kafeijao/cvr_osc_lib_py) to abstract this OSC API with examples!

Refer to the [IN-DEPTH](https://github.com/kafeijao/Kafe_CVR_Mods/tree/master/OSC) documentation for more information.

**Optional Requirements**
- [ChatBox](https://api.cvrmg.com/v1/mods/download/168)
versions.changelog: - Changed a log to prevent being picked up by lum as an error when it's not

versions.author: kafeijao
versions.description:
This mod enables hiding avatar game objects in the first person view. You will need to add the tag `[FPH]` to a game object name (Eg: `HairRoot[FPH]69`), it will **also** hide its children game objects.

Is uses the same mechanism as the head shrinking, so hidden game objects will still be visible for mirrors and cameras.

You can customize the tags to hide in the config. 
Has to be via `MelonPreferences.cfg`

You can exclude single game objects from being hidden with the tag `[FPR]`, this is implemented in the base game and doesn't need the mod to work (you can use this to reveal your hair in first person that's hidden by the head shrink for example).

Check [README.md](https://github.com/kafeijao/Kafe_CVR_Mods/tree/master/FirstPersonHider) for more info.

versions.name: DesktopHeadTracking
versions.author: SDraw
versions.description:
This mod adds desktop head tracking based on data from memory-mapped file `head/data`.
Refer to [readme](https://github.com/SDraw/ml_mods_cvr/tree/master/ml_dht#readme) for usage and additional information.

versions.name: FreedomFingers
versions.author: kafeijao
versions.description:
This removes the annoying index controller toggle to switch between finger tracking and animation, replacing it with a gesture lock toggle. Where your fingers are tracked **all** the time but you can pick whether you want gestures or not.

You can enable notifications in the melon config, to know whether the gestures are enabled or not.

Check [README.md](https://github.com/kafeijao/Kafe_CVR_Mods/tree/master/FreedomFingers) for more info.
versions.changelog: - Fixed gesture toggle not working when bound to the right hand controller

versions.name: Action Menu
versions.author: Daky
versions.description: Radial menu to quickly control your avatar and game settings with just a few taps of your joystick. Open SteamVR binding for CVR and assign 'Open Action Menu' to your favorite button.

versions.name: DesktopVRSwitch
versions.author: NotAKidoS
versions.description:
Allows you to switch between Desktop and VR with a keybind.
**Press Control + F6 to switch or optionally through BTKUI.**

While this mod is a nice convenience feature to have access to, not every ChilloutVR system or mod is built to support it. I cannot possibly cover every edge case or mitigate issues with every mod. **Use at your own discretion.**
versions.changelog:
- Fixes for 2023r172.
- Mouse is now force unlocked once entering VR mode as QOL.

versions.name: FreezeFrame
versions.author: Eric van Fandenfart
versions.description:
Creates a Freeze Frame locally of avatars in a world by creating a copy of each avatar. The avatar is in the state the Freeze Frame was activated. Freeze Frames can be stacked and all Freeze Frames can be deleted afterward.
The buttons to create an delete Freeze Frames are found in the action menu
Its also possible to record animations and play them back afterwards
versions.changelog:
Now for CVR
Removed a bug that required VRC

versions.name: CameraAnimation
versions.author: Eric van Fandenfart
versions.description: Create camera animations for recording scenes in CVR
versions.changelog:
Fixed Camera Animations being bugged in vr mode
Added playback on cvr cam

versions.name: Blackout
versions.author: Nirvash, NotAKidoS
versions.description:
Dims your screen after set time of sitting still. Intended for VR sleeping.
  
  The three states are Awake > Drowsy > Sleep. Drowsy and Sleep both have customizable visual options (HDR Clamp, Hue, Desaturation, Brightness) and the mod can lower your master volume when sleeping.

There are customizable thresholds for entering and exiting from Drowsy and Sleep, these are based off of your head movement velocity (Normalized on your avatar size). Along with this the mod can watch your player momvement, joystick activity, to move to a more wakeful state. 

The mod can watch your controller movement and menu activity to prevent tranitioning to a sleepier state. 

There are a couple 'debounce' options to prevent an accidental transition from sleeping to awake. 'Delay between Wakeup' makes it so a transition from Sleep>Drowsy and then from Drowsy>Awake must have a certain delay between them. 'Activity Debounce'  means that you must have two valid inputs within a time window before it will move you up a wakeful state. 

Integration with avatar Parameters (BlackoutModDrowsy & BlackoutModSleep) which get set True if in the refective states.

versions.name: ProfilesExtended
versions.author: kafeijao
versions.description:
This mod adds functionality to avatar parameter profiles system.

__**Features**__
- Exclude parameters from changing by including `*` in their AAS name
- Exclude parameters not present in the AAS from loading via profiles
- Bypass the exclusion by including `*` in the profile name
- Remember **current** parameters across avatar changes or game restarts

__**Config**__
- Whether to exclude or not parameters not in AAS on profile load. **default:** `true`
- Define which tags are used. **default**: `*`
- Remember current parameters across av. changes/game restarts. **default**: `true`
- Name of profile used to remember parameters. **default**: `Auto`

Refer to the [IN-DEPTH](https://github.com/kafeijao/Kafe_CVR_Mods/tree/master/ProfilesExtended) documentation for more information.

versions.name: Local Parameter Extender
versions.author: Xan // Eti
versions.description: This mod adds functionality to certain animator parameters, such as #IsLocal (the full list is in the readme).
versions.changelog:
**Note: 2.0.0 implements a breaking change**.
* Breaking: Parameters now replicate with CVR's network (that is, the leading `#` should be removed to let others see it). This encourages avatar design that is compatible between vanilla and modded players.
  * A new config value has been added so that users may opt into locally computing the applicable parameters of remote avatars, but in line with this change, #local parameters are skipped.
* Fixed a bug causing pitch/roll values to reference the wrong transform.
* The object that the driver component is attached to has changed to the avatar itself.
* Added support for `#FingerTracking` boolean parameter (local only).

versions.name: StateBehaviours
versions.author: NotAKidoS
versions.description:
Adds a couple State Machine Behaviours for avatar creators to tinker with until native solutions are released.

Simple Driver (OnEnter, OnExit)
Set, Add, Random, Copy

Update Driver (OnUpdate)
PlayTime, NormalizedTime, Lerp

Body Control (OnEnter, OnExit)
Toggle VRIK limb(s) weight or autofootstep.

These behaviours are **Local Only** and only function on your own avatar.
You will need to download the accompanying Unitypackage under **Requirments** to add and upload with in Unity.

versions.name: PathCamDisabler
versions.author: NotAKidoS
versions.description:
Adds option to disable the Path Camera Controller to free up your numkeys.
Additional option to disable flight binding.

versions.name: BeautifyParticles
versions.author: Val Snow
versions.description: Makes particles much more realistic in VR. Beautify particles allows you to customise how particles are rendered. This can greatly increases immersion in VR.
versions.changelog: Fixed a bug when BTKUILib is not installed

versions.name: BetterLipsync
versions.author: kafeijao
versions.description:
Mod to replace the viseme controller with the oculus lipsync. It will apply to all avatars but just locally (so others without the mod will still see the CVR default visemes behaviour).

It was implemented to do the heavy work in separated threads, so there shouldn't be a noticeable performance drop.

Make sure to play with the configurations to get the best look for yourself, I've set the default settings to be my personal preference. Some people prefer more smoothing other people prefer less.

Check [README.md](https://github.com/kafeijao/Kafe_CVR_Mods/tree/master/BetterLipsync) for comparison videos and more info.
versions.changelog: - Fixed issue where the Smoothing setting wasn't being set to the value defined.

versions.name: BTKUILib
versions.author: DDAkebono
versions.description:
This mod is designed to make it very simple to create functional menus within the ChilloutVR Quick Menu. The whole goal of this library is to provide a simple API to create usable menus properly integrated within the CVR QuickMenu, all without ever having to touch Cohtml!

You can join the support Discord for help creating UIs and feature requests!
https://discord.gg/z3wAVGmFQP

This library in itself is a mod for ChilloutVR providing some small features internally, but primarily to avoid issues of similar projects that existed in the other game (cough cough ReMod.Core)

> Features
 - Expandable Tab bar
 - Players in World selection menu
 - Basic buttons and toggles
 - Highly configurable sliders
 - Categories
 - Multiselection radio toggle menu
 - And more! Check the Github for a better list!
versions.changelog:
Small bug fix release for you nerds! Removed some logging and added a toggle to disable the QM player selector redirect.

Changes:
- Added option to disable player selector QM redirect (MelonPref/BTKUILib Settings Page)
- Removed unneeded debug logging

versions.name: BTKSAImmersiveHud
versions.author: DDAkebono
versions.description: Immersive Hud mod for ChilloutVR, only displays the hud when notifications come in or a state changes (Mic mute/unmute, hud message, prop spawning, etc).
versions.changelog: Fixed issues with reticle hiding and null errors with hud materials (Thanks Kafe!), added compatibility check for UILib 2.0.0+

versions.name: BTKSASelfPortrait
versions.author: DDAkebono
versions.description: BTK Standalone: Self Portrait is a small mod that adds a toggleable face camera to the Hud.
versions.changelog: Fixed Enable At Start option not properly setting state of toggle, added compatibility check for UILib 2.0.0+

versions.name: BTKSANameplateMod
versions.author: DDAkebono
versions.description:
BTK Standalone: Nameplate Mod is a small mod for ChilloutVR that changes a bit of how the nameplate works!

The main features of this mod are:
 - Hide nameplates on friends only
 - Toggle nameplate visibility on a per user basis (In QuickMenu user select)
 - Nameplate distance based scaling
 - Configurable close range fade, this replaces CVRs built in fade out with one that can be configured
versions.changelog: Fixed error spam with NameplateAdjuster when local user is changing avatar, added compatibility check for UILib 2.0.0+

versions.name: DesktopVRIK
versions.author: NotAKidoS
versions.description:
Adds VRIK to Desktop avatars. No longer will you be a liveless sliding statue~!
Adds the small feet stepping when looking around on Desktop.

Optional BTKUILib integration.
versions.changelog:
- Fixes for 2023r173.
- Fixed ResetFootstepsOnIdle not working as intended.
- Added swimming pitch control.
- Added active body offset.

versions.reason: Was implemented into the game as a native feature.
versions.name: EyeMovementFix
versions.author: kafeijao
versions.description:
Mod to attempt to fix some of the current issues with the eye movement.
This will affect the local and remote players eye movement but only for the local client. As well as adding new features!

__**Enhancements**__
The target system will prefer people that: Are closer both distance and from the view center, are currently talking, are not a mirror reflection, and are the local player (yourself) :)

__**Avatar Eye Rotation Limits**__
- [Custom CCK Component](https://github.com/kafeijao/Kafe_CVR_CCKs/blob/master/EyeMovementFix)
- Unity Muscle Rig limits on the eyes.

Check [README.md](https://github.com/kafeijao/Kafe_CVR_Mods/tree/master/EyeMovementFix) for more in-depth info including which issues were addressed.

versions.name: TheClapper
versions.author: kafeijao
versions.description:
Mod that allows you to **clap** other people... and props!

This adds the clapping the camera functionality for **avatars** and **props**.

For **avatars** you need to clap the head of the player you want to hide, effectively hiding that player avatar. If you clap the kyle's head (default robot avatar when player hidden), it will un-hide the player's avatar.

For **props** you need to clap their origin point, which most times is on the center or base of the prop. If you clap a **prop** you spawned it will delete it for everyone, otherwise it will delete it only for you locally.

__**Configuration**__
- Prevent clapping your friends (enabled by default).
- Show visualizers of the clappable areas when doing the hand open gesture on both hands (enabled by default).
- Set the delay that takes for visualizers to show.

Check [README.md](https://github.com/kafeijao/Kafe_CVR_Mods/tree/master/TheClapper) for more info.
versions.changelog:
- Added option to disable Avatar clapping completely (`off` by default)
- Added option to disable Prop clapping completely (`off` by default)
- Added option to allow always clapping avatars when they are hidden, useless if avatar clapping is disabled (`on` by default)
- Added option that adds all prop pickup points as clappable points (`off` by default)
- Added option that adds all prop sub-sync points as clappable points (`off` by default)
- Added option that prevents clapping props spawned by the local player (`off` by default)
- Added option that prevents clapping friend's spawned props (`off` by default)
- Fixed prevent clapping friends props being true by default
- Fixed prevent clapping friend's props also preventing clapping our own.

versions.name: PlayerRotator
versions.author: Exterrata
versions.description: A mod that allows rotation of both the tracking and the player and a horizon center feature to rotate you level when your laying down
versions.changelog:
- update for r171
- add icons - pull request from Nirv-git
- change menu functionality
- rename to be consistent with my other mods

versions.name: WholesomeLoader
versions.author: Totally Wholesome Team
versions.description:
Welcome to Totally Wholesome!

TW introduces unique and new player-to-player interactions that allow for one player, the "master", to have various forms of control over another, the "pet".
This is intended to be used with one or more consenting parties, so all features can be toggled and role requests are mandatory by default.

Features:
 - Networked leashes between players
 - Remote pet gagging
 - Remote avatar parameter control
 - World/Prop pinning
 - PiShock integration
 - Buttplug.io toy integration
 - Optional visable nameplate icon
 - and much more!
versions.changelog:
This release addresses an issue with the TW config where it would cause the loader to die if it was empty, it also adds a shorter timeout and proper error information when the loader fails to get the TW assembly.

Changes:
- Fixed empty config causing loader to die
- Set shorter timeout for assembly fetch request (20 seconds)
- Added additional error information for request failures

versions.name: ExtendedGameNotifications
versions.author: SDraw
versions.description: Adds additional menu and HUD notifications

versions.name: PortableCameraAdditions
versions.author: NotAKidoS
versions.description:
Adds a few basic settings to the Portable Camera.

Expert settings for Near Clip & Far Clip.
Expert settings for Orthographic & Orthographic Size.
By default, Near Clip & Far Clip are copied on world load.

versions.name: PickupArmMovement
versions.author: SDraw
versions.description: Adds arm tracking upon holding pickup in desktop mode

versions.name: AASBufferFix
versions.author: NotAKidoS
versions.description:
Fixes two issues with the Avatar Advanced Settings buffers when loading remote avatars. In simple terms, it means 'fewer wardrobe malfunctions'.

Empty buffer (all 0/false) will no longer be applied on load.
Received AAS data is ignored until the wearer has loaded into the expected avatar.
(The avatar will sit in its default state until the wearer has loaded and started syncing correct AAS)
AAS will no longer be sent while switching avatar.

Please view the GitHub README for links to relevant feedback posts.
versions.changelog: - Fixed an issue with the avatar footprint being calculated with values that exceed the 3200 AAS bit limit.

versions.name: Swap Reticle
versions.author: Misatyan
versions.description: Replaces the red square dot with a round translucent one (looks much better than the standard one, but adheres to the general interface style)

versions.name: Better Interact Desktop
versions.author: Misatyan
versions.description:
Allows you to tilt your head to the left or right (LeftCTRL + MouseWheel)
Frees his hands and stretches them forward (Q - left hand, E - right hand)
Most important: allows you to switch gestures using the mouse wheel (LeftShift + MouseWheel - for the left hand, F + MouseWheel - for the right hand)

versions.name: FuckToes
versions.author: NotAKidoS
versions.description:
Prevents VRIK from using toe bones in HalfBody or FBT.

VRIK calculates weird center of mass when toes are mapped, so it is sometimes desired to unmap toes to prevent an avatars feet from resting far back.

Please see the README for relevant imagery detailing the problem.

versions.name: NearClipPlaneAdj
versions.author: Nirvash
versions.description:
This is a mod for adjusting the near clipping plane for the player's camera. This can allow you to get much closer to objects before they start clipping and be used for seeing your limbs with a VERY small avatar.
  
  Buttons for adjusting clipping plane on the fly are available using BTKUI with the NirvMisc or default Misc page.
versions.changelog: Now applies values on CVRWorld.CopyRefCamValues after joining a world instead of waiting 15 seconds

versions.name: HeadLightMod
versions.author: Nirvash
versions.description:
Adds a standalone headlight to your player. Included are options to swap between a Spot/Point light source and adjust the brightness, angle, range and color.

You can access the HeadLight using BTKUI with the NirvMisc or default Misc page.

versions.name: Instances
versions.author: kafeijao
versions.description:
__**Features**__:
- Rejoin the last instance when restarting the game.
- When rejoining teleport to the previous location.
- When starting the game, join on an online Instance of the Home world.
- Keep the joined Instances History and allow to rejoin them.
- Restart the game via button.

You can toggle the joining last instance, or/and starting in an online instance, rejoining last Instance takes priority. Also you can configure the online instance region and privacy type.

Check [README.md](https://github.com/kafeijao/Kafe_CVR_Mods/tree/master/Instances) for more in-depth info.

**Optional Requirements**
- [ChatBox](https://api.cvrmg.com/v1/mods/download/168)
versions.changelog:
- Added DeepLink compatibility (Instances will no longer skip the deep link urls to start the game in a certain instance)
- Updated obsolete code

versions.name: CVRSuperMario64
versions.author: kafeijao
versions.description:
The SM64 Mario mod lets you play as Mario in ChilloutVR Worlds using the Super Mario 64 engine. You can control Mario, attack other players who are also playing as Mario, and interact with colliders in the world.
You can also check the CVR Camera, it allows to control Mario using its perspective (also has camera settings)

**__Note__**: You need to download and install a specific SM64 ROM, follow the [Instructions](https://github.com/kafeijao/Kafe_CVR_Mods/tree/master/CVRSuperMario64#rom-installation)

The mod comes with several pre-made public props like Mario, power-up caps, and teleporters, and you can also create your own using the CCK (Still in development, and might break compatibility soon). Just search props for: `SM64`
Spawning the `SM64 Mario` prop should get you started.

While the mod tries to work with all world's colliders, sometimes fails, either by not working at all or causing lag.

A world that works nicely with this mod is: `Inas Chill Apartment`

The mod has a bunch of configurations, I highly recommend to change them to your liking.

Check [README.md](https://github.com/kafeijao/Kafe_CVR_Mods/tree/master/CVRSuperMario64) for more in-depth info.

versions.name: FuckMetrics
versions.author: NotAKidoS
versions.description:
This mod limits UpdateMetrics & SendCoreUpdate while the menus are closed. This helps to alleviate hitching and performance issues, particularly with FPS drops while unmuted in online instances and VRIK tapping in place.

Please view the Github README for more info.
versions.changelog:
- Initial Release.
- Renamed to FuckMetrics.
- Add Update Rate settings.
- Add back CohtmlView disabling as option.
- Update CoreUpdate on mic toggle if QM is open.
- Fix Cohtml disabling not using menu instance.

versions.name: LocalLightMod
versions.author: Nirvash
versions.description:
Have you ever thought 'This world's lighting sucks' or 'Its too dark' well I have the solution for you! This mod lets you configure and spawn local (Spot|Point|Directional) light sources with near full customizability and provides functionality for saving and loading presets.
  
  Now you may think 'just use props!' and that is true, but sometimes you want more control or the world doesn't allow them.
  
You can access the settings using BTKUI with the NirvMisc or default Misc page.
versions.changelog: Fix for CVR 2023r173 Hotfix which removed System.Windows.Forms

versions.name: IKpresets
versions.author: Nirvash
versions.description:
Provides an alternative menu for editing IK settings, includes options for automatically loading IK settings for specific avatars and 16 general slots to store presets.

You can access the settings using BTKUI with the NirvMisc or default Misc page.
versions.changelog:
Now prints previous settings to the Console when making changes
Fix for CVR 2024174ex3

versions.name: WorldPropListMod
versions.author: Nirvash
versions.description:
Provides a list of all the props in a world with details such as the player that spawned it, distance and location, tags and more. You can delete + block individual props and highlight or create a line towards their location.     
     
You can access the settings using BTKUI with the 'Props' page. (Toggle in MelonPrefs to switch to NirvMisc Page)
versions.changelog: Fixes Prop details getting stuck loading from the API due the first response having Null data

versions.name: PlayerRagdollMod
versions.author: SDraw
versions.description:
Turns player's avatar into ragdoll puppet.
Press `R` key to switch between ragdoll and normal states.
Additional options are available with [BTKUILib](https://github.com/BTK-Development/BTKUILib) and [UIExpansionKit](https://github.com/ddakebono/ChilloutMods).
versions.changelog:
- Ability to grab ragdolled parts by remote players
Note: disabled by default, can be toggled in BTKUILib menu page.

versions.name: PostProcessingOverrides
versions.author: kafeijao
versions.description:
__**Features**__:
- Enable/Disable/Force/Override Post processing configurations for the current world (persistent).
- Choose between Original, Global, Custom, and Off for which Post Processing configuration type should be use for the current world.
- Chose which Configuration Type a world gets when you join for the first time (via melon preferences).
- While using Global or Custom, you can configure the settings to be: Off, Original, or Override.

Check [README.md](https://github.com/kafeijao/Kafe_CVR_Mods/tree/master/PostProcessingOverrides) for more in-depth info.
versions.changelog: - Fixed error preventing to join certain worlds

versions.reason: Mostly implemented natively in the game
versions.name: QuickMenuAccessibility
versions.author: kafeijao
versions.description:
__**Features**__:
- Swap Quick Menu to Right Hand.
- Swap buttons for Quick Menu with the Main Menu.
- Make Quick Menu spawn in world space.
- Change the Quick and Menu buttons to Cycle between menus.
- When loses tracking on one hand, the QM is set to World Space and cycle menus with single key is turned on.

Check [README.md](https://github.com/kafeijao/Kafe_CVR_Mods/tree/master/QuickMenuAccessibility) for more in-depth info.
versions.changelog: - Updated the namespace of MenuScalePatch to match the newer version.

versions.name: IKFixes
versions.author: NotAKidoS
versions.description:
A few small fixes and configuration options to IK. Major ones are listed below:

**FBT** - Fixes root rotation animation bleeding, chest tracking, locomotion animations, chair seated direction, and bend goal offsets.

**Halfbody** - Fixes footsteps while on a Movement Parent & feet always pointing in head direction.
versions.changelog: - Fix Seated Play button not returning once disconnecting all trackers from SteamVR.

versions.name: LimbGrabber
versions.author: Exterrata, Puff Machine
versions.description: A mod that lets people grab your limbs and throw you around, also can ragdoll with the help of [PlayerRagdollMod](https://github.com/SDraw/ml_mods_cvr/releases/download/r157/ml_prm.dll)

versions.name: ModLoadSeparator
versions.author: RinLovesYou, Hordini
versions.description: Creates two folders in your Mods folder, for loading some mods only on Desktop or VR

versions.name: NoHardwareAcceleration
versions.author: kafeijao
versions.description:
Simple mod that disables the AV Pro hardware acceleration.

Check [README.md](https://github.com/kafeijao/Kafe_CVR_Mods/tree/master/NoHardwareAcceleration) for more in-depth info.

versions.name: MinimizeWindows
versions.author: kafeijao
versions.description:
Simple mod allows you to automatically Minimize Game/Melon Loader Console Windows when starting the game. By default it will Minimize the Game window when starting in VR.

Check [README.md](https://github.com/kafeijao/Kafe_CVR_Mods/tree/master/MinimizeWindows) for more in-depth info.

versions.name: PropUndoButton
versions.author: NotAKidoS
versions.description:
**CTRL+Z** to undo latest spawned prop. **CTRL+SHIFT+Z** to redo deleted prop.
Includes optional SFX for prop spawn, undo, redo, warn, and deny, which can be disabled in settings.

You can replace the sfx in 'ChilloutVR\ChilloutVR_Data\StreamingAssets\Cohtml\UIResources\GameUI\mods\PropUndo\audio'.

versions.name: BetterAFK
versions.author: kafeijao
versions.description:
Enhance your AFK experience in CVR with Better AFK, a mod that improves the AFK detection and provides a more accurate and customizable AFK state.

**__Features:__**
- Fixes the Parameter Stream `Headset On Head` and `Time Since Headset Removed` to work correctly.
- Sets the `AFK` **bool** parameter, and the `AFKTimer` **float** or **int** parameter (**float** will have decimal cases) representing the time in seconds since you've been AFK.
- Allows manual triggering of the AFK state by pressing the `End` key on your keyboard.
- Configure whether to enter AFK state when Opening the Steam Overlay (enabled by default).

Check [README.md](https://github.com/kafeijao/Kafe_CVR_Mods/tree/master/BetterAFK) for more in-depth info.

versions.name: ClearHudNotifications
versions.author: NotAKidoS
versions.description: Clears queued hud notifications when joining a new online instance. Can also press F4 to manually clear notifications.

versions.name: QMShutdownOptionsMod
versions.author: Nirvash
versions.description:
Adds options to Shutdown/Sleep/Hibernate your computer from your QuickMenu. (Only works on Windows)
     
You can access the settings using BTKUI with the NirvMisc or default Misc page. (Toggle in MelonPrefs)

versions.name: JumpPatch
versions.author: NotAKidoS
versions.description:
Prevents you from jumping until you've been grounded for a frame.
This ensures Grounded parameter fires when hitting the ground while holding jump.
versions.changelog: - Return jump input after MovementSystem.Update. Fixes conflict with PRM jump-to-recover option.

versions.name: BadAnimatorFix
versions.author: NotAKidoS
versions.description:
This mod periodically rewinds looping animation states.
It resolves issues with locomotion animations freezing after extended AFK periods.
If you aren't AFK frequently, this mod might not be essential for you.
versions.changelog:
- No longer rewinds states without loop specifically enabled.
- Removed performance improvement claim, which has seemingly been fixed in 2021.
- Fixed not being able to disable mod with the Enabled button.

versions.name: Tracking Toggles
versions.author: Phoebe Potat
versions.description: This mod allows the user to toggle tracking for their arms and lower body. This can be useful when you want to run animations while in vr

versions.name: NoHeadShrinkMod
versions.author: Nirvash
versions.description:
By default your local avatar's head is shrunk down to make it not visible in the normal first person camera.      

This mod adds options for disabling your local avatar's head from shrinking completely, or to auto un-shrink it if your camera is a certain distance from your avatar.     
**Functionality is disabled by default**   
This is a niche mod, but can be very useful in certain circumstances.     
           
Optional support for BTKUI with settings in the NirvMisc or default Misc page. (Toggle in MelonPrefs)

versions.name: PlayerMovementCopycat
versions.author: SDraw
versions.description: Allows to copy pose, gestures and movement of your friends

versions.name: ScrollZoom
versions.author: AstroDoge
versions.description: Enables the ability to adjust your zoom level by rolling your scroll wheel up/down!

versions.name: WrongMic
versions.author: kafeijao
versions.description:
Really simple mod that saves the microphone in separated configs, depending whether you are in `Desktop` or `VR`.

No configuration required! Just install, change the microphone with the usual in-game menus if it's wrong, and then forget about it. Say goodbye to people tell you __**Wrong Mic**__!

Check [README.md](https://github.com/kafeijao/Kafe_CVR_Mods/tree/master/WrongMic) for more in-depth info.

versions.name: TurnKeys
versions.author: AstroDoge
versions.description: Allows keyboard-only turning using the Q and E keys!

versions.name: Logger++
versions.author: kafeijao
versions.description:
Simple `Plugin` that redirects **and** filters unity logs to the Melon Loader console.

__**Features**__
- Enable/Disable filters (melon prefs).
- Rate Limit the same log to only be printed every 5 secs max.
- Enable full stack traces for `info`/`warning`/`error` Logs.

**Note:** The IL offsets are not printed in the MelonLogger console because unity adds those internally :(

Check [README.md](https://github.com/kafeijao/Kafe_CVR_Mods/tree/master/Logger++) for more in-depth info.
versions.changelog:
- Fixed for 2024r176
- Fixed an issue where some logs were missing

versions.name: GrabbyBones
versions.author: kafeijao
versions.description:
Adds grabbing to `Dynamic Bones` and `Magica Cloth Bones`.

__**Features**__
- Uses the bone's radius configuration for grabbing radius.
- Sets animator parameters. Check [README.md](https://github.com/kafeijao/Kafe_CVR_Mods/tree/master/GrabbyBones)
- Can be disabled for specific scripts using `[NGB]` tag on the game object name.
- Prevent grabbing a specific bone within a script using `[NGBB]` tag on the bone's game object name.

__**Notes**__
- If you find broken avatars share the avatar and contact me.

Check [README.md](https://github.com/kafeijao/Kafe_CVR_Mods/tree/master/GrabbyBones) for more in-depth info.

versions.name: TrackedControllerFix
versions.author: NotAKidoS
versions.description:
Allows your controllers to track while the SteamVR overlay is open. This also fixes Quest/Touch controllers feeling slow during fast movements.

Support for SmoothRay & DesktopVRSwitch.
**Only supports OpenVR, not OpenXR.**
versions.changelog:
- Fixes for 2023r171.
- Prevented from initializing when launching with OpenXR.

versions.name: SmootherRay
versions.author: NotAKidoS
versions.description:
Smoothes your controller while the raycast lines are visible.
This is a CVR adaptation of a Beat Saber mod: [BeatSaber_SmoothedController](https://github.com/kinsi55/BeatSaber_SmoothedController)

- An option is provided to only smooth when aiming at menus.
- Smoothing characteristics are completely configurable, but the defaults are basically perfect.
- Pairs well with the [WhereAmIPointing](https://discord.com/channels/1001388809184870441/1002058238545641542/1282798820073406556) mod.

**Only supports OpenVR, not OpenXR.**

-# NOTE: This disables the shitty built-in Smooth Ray setting when the mod is enabled. Compare both & you'll see why.
versions.changelog:
- Fixed for 2024r176.
- Rebranded to SmootherRayer due to native implementation now existing and sucking.

versions.name: AdultToyAPI
versions.author: DarkPowers
versions.description: A tool for integrating the Intiface project (also known as Buttplug.io) into CVR Mods
versions.changelog: - Fixing an issue where if using Intiface Central or another external version of Intiface, devices already connected would not be recognized.

versions.name: CVRGoesBrrr
versions.author: DarkPowers
versions.description: A Mod for using your avatar to control your adult toys. Based on the Vibe Goes Brrr by Jace. This mod Supports using DPS, Touch zones and even props when they are attached to your avatar. Avatar parameter driving is currently experimental and goes by the name of the DPS or touch zone.
versions.changelog:
- Added an option to not use background threads and instead use the main ui thread 
- Fixed an issue due to CVR changing the VibratePlayerHands method

versions.name: HeadBobbingFix
versions.author: NotAKidoS
versions.description: Fixes Desktop camera pivoting in place when full head bobbing is enabled. Please view the README for more info: [README](https://github.com/NotAKidOnSteam/NAK_CVR_Mods/blob/main/HeadBobbingFix/README.md)
versions.changelog:
- Initial Release
- Rename to HeadBobbingFix to prevent confusion

versions.name: JoinMe
versions.author: Exterrata
versions.description: auto accept all invite requests or only accept from a whitelist. add people to whitelist through btk player tab
versions.changelog:
- update for r171
- fixed blocking all menu invite responses
- added whitelist

versions.name: BetterPortals
versions.author: kafeijao
versions.description:
**__Features:__**
- Added `Drop Portal` button on user's details page
- Portals always drop, even when there's no surfaces available
- Display a timer with the seconds left until the portal closes
- Joining portals by walking on top of it
- Optionally require an input (`J` or `Trigger` press) to enter a portal
- Optionally get a notification for invisible portal drops (when they are dropped on top of you)

Check [README.md](https://github.com/kafeijao/Kafe_CVR_Mods/tree/master/BetterPortals) for more in-depth info.

versions.name: ChatBox
versions.author: kafeijao
versions.description:
Communicate with other people in the instance using Text and **ChatBox**es!

__**Features**__
- Press `Y` or BTKUI button in the Misc section to send messages.
- Use [VRBindings](https://api.cvrmg.com/v1/mods/download/174) to allow choosing a SteamVR Binding.
- Heavily customizable via BKTUI settings menu in the Misc section.
- Modify the notification sounds by replacing the files at `/UserData/Chatbox/`
- Use bool animator param `ChatBox/Typing` or `#ChatBox/Typing`
- View the ChatBox History window via the BTKUI button in the Misc section.
- Press `Arrow up`/`Arrow down` to iterate through the sent messages. You can also click `Prev` if you're in VR.
- Press `Tab` or `Auto` in VR to attempt to auto-complete usernames.
- Use `@target-username` to mention people in messages.
- Self moderation for individual players.
- Profanity filter (needs to be populated).

Check [README.md](https://github.com/kafeijao/Kafe_CVR_Mods/tree/master/ChatBox) for more in-depth info.

**Optional Requirements**
- [VRBinding](https://api.cvrmg.com/v1/mods/download/174)
versions.changelog:
- Fixed for 2024r176
- Added the option to also TTS when sending a msg via chatbox (off by default)
- Fixed annoying bug where sometimes when you were typing a TTS msg and pressed `Y` it would reset and start sending a ChatBox msg.

versions.name: RequestLib
versions.author: kafeijao
versions.description:
The Request Lib is a Mod that allows users to receive requests from other players in the same instance via the Mod Network.

This will enable mods to ask permission for things to players without both having a specific mod. For example if both players have the **RequestLib**, this will allow the `Player 1` with the **TeleportRequest** mod to request to teleport to `Player 2` even if the `Player 2` doesn't have the **TeleportRequest** mod.

__**Features**__
- Receive requests from remote players via the Mod Network.
- Similarly to invites, you receive:
 - Hud message icon
 - Quick Menu notification with `Accept`/`Decline`
 - Main Menu Messages Tab named `Mod Requests`
- Fully customizable permissions that allow requests to be asked, auto-accepted, or auto-declined
- Several permissions granularity, they can be global, per player, and even per player + mod combo.

Check [README.md](https://github.com/kafeijao/Kafe_CVR_Mods/tree/master/RequestLib) for more in-depth info including the `API` to add this to your mods.

versions.name: TeleportRequest
versions.author: kafeijao
versions.description:
This mod allows you to request to teleport to other players. You're only able to request/accept if the world allows flight.

__**Features**__
- Request to teleport to a player.
- Teleport yourself to the previous location before teleporting to a player.

**Note:** This mod has optional integration with [ChatBox](https://api.cvrmg.com/v1/mods/download/168). It allows to write commands in the ChatBox to request to teleport, accept/decline, and go back.

Check [README.md](https://github.com/kafeijao/Kafe_CVR_Mods/tree/master/TeleportRequest) for more in-depth info.

**Optional Requirements**
- [ChatBox](https://api.cvrmg.com/v1/mods/download/168)
versions.changelog: - Fixed teleport erroring, thanks H3wastooshort for the report.

versions.name: FOVAdjustment
versions.author: NotAKidoS
versions.description:
A simple mod that makes CVR_DesktopCameraController defaultFov configurable by the user if the world author didn't specify a custom world FOV.

Custom FOV values are limited between 60f and 120f to match the limitations imposed on world creators.

versions.name: MuteSFX
versions.author: Exterrata & NotAKidoS
versions.description:
A simple mod to add an audio cue for muting and unmuting.

You can replace the sfx in 'ChilloutVR\ChilloutVR_Data\StreamingAssets\Cohtml\UIResources\GameUI\mods\MuteSFX\audio'.
versions.changelog: - Fixed Push to Talk spamming SFX.

versions.name: ControllerFreeze
versions.author: Exterrata
versions.description: freezes quest controllers when they turn off instead of them flying off

versions.name: VRBinding
versions.author: Daky
versions.description: Easily add new bindings in SteamVR for mods. Those bindings are proposed to users like the ones for CVR.
versions.changelog: fix steamvr duplicate key exception (fix issue with vr-desktop switching)

versions.name: QRCode
versions.author: kafeijao
versions.description:
Read QRCodes with the CVR Camera. After scanned they show up in the little menu and you can click to interact with them (if you don't click, no action will be done).

- QRCodes for `Avatars`, `Props`, `Users`, `Worlds`, and `Instances` will open the corresponding details page in-game.
- URL QRCodes will open the url in your browser.
- All others will copy the text content of the QRCode into your clipboard.

If you want to test, search for the `QR Code Demo` Prop, it contains all types of QRCodes.

Check [README.md](https://github.com/kafeijao/Kafe_CVR_Mods/tree/master/QRCode) for more in-depth info (including how to make CVR Entities QRCodes).

versions.name: FuckMLA
versions.author: NotAKidoS
versions.description:
A simple mod that does three basic things:

- Destroys MOUSELOCKALPHA, the script that locks your mouse on startup.
- Forces mouse to be initially unlocked when launching the game in VR.
- Fixes mouse rotating player when cursor is unlocked.

versions.reason: Was implemented into the game as a native feature.
versions.name: BetterCache
versions.author: kafeijao
versions.description:
Simple mod that improves the Cache management and cleaning.

**__Features__**
- Deletes the files with older accessed date when above the limit
- Set a custom Cache Folder location (default: `ChilloutVR/Cache/`)
- Set a Max limit for the Cache (default: `20GB`)
- Buttons to clear cache
- Deletes original Cache Folders to prevent cluttering

Check [README.md](https://github.com/kafeijao/Kafe_CVR_Mods/tree/master/BetterCache) for more in-depth info.
versions.changelog: - Stop poking cohtml outside of main thread (fixes a crash).

versions.name: ViveExtendedInput
versions.author: SDraw
versions.description: Adds several options of controlling gestures' behaviour for Vive controllers in `Settings - Input & Key-Bindings` menu page

versions.name: MiniMap
versions.author: Daky
versions.description: Spawns a minimap with experimental stereo display (for VR) and basic options

versions.name: RemoveChairs
versions.author: Nirvash
versions.description:
Buttons to simply disable or enable active chairs in the world. (For those worlds covered in chair with no easy toggle to disable them)
_You understand that disabling stuff in a world can break stuff_

You can access the settings using BTKUI with the 'Props' page. (Toggle in MelonPrefs to switch to NirvMisc Page)

versions.name: BTKSADiscordExtended
versions.author: DDAkebono
versions.description:
DiscordExtended replaces the built in Discord Rich Presense with one that's more configurable and has some additional features!

Settings
- Display World Details - Controls if the rich presence should show world name, privacy mode, image, and player count
- Display Private World Details - Sets if the above should be displayed in private instances
- Display Username - Sets if the rich presence should show your username on it
- Display Profile Button - Displays a button that links to your ABI Hub profile page
versions.changelog: Resubmitted with the right dll, oops.

versions.name: ViewPointTweaks
versions.author: Nirvash
versions.description:
[VR Only]
This mod provides the ability to change your avatar's viewpoint position+rotation (really the camera) live in game, along with the much more niche feature of adjusting the scale of the VR camera to adjust it's 'IPD'.

You can save these settings per avatar and have them autoload.

You can access the settings using BTKUI with the NirvMisc or default Misc page. (Toggle in MelonPrefs)

versions.name: NoMenuTouch
versions.author: Nirvash
versions.description:
CVR be default allows you to 'touch' your MainMenu and QuickMenu as an input option, while neat this can result in unintentional inputs specially when you open your QuickMenu with your hands near each other.
This mod simply disables that feature with a toggle in UIX/MelonPrefs.

versions.name: CVRCameraDontOverrender
versions.author: Nirvash
versions.description:
Stops the Camera from over rendering your local player. Now you can see your hands when interacting with it!    

*Yes I know there is the experimental option to have your player overrender the UI, but that is the ENTIRE UI.*       

This toggle can be accessed from UIX/Melonprefs

versions.name: AvatarSyncedLook
versions.author: SDraw
versions.description:
Forces local player's eyes look direction to be synced for remote players.
Can be toggled in `Settings - Interactions - Avatar Synced Look` menu entry.

versions.name: PlayersInstanceNotifier
versions.author: SDraw
versions.description:
Implements sound notifications for players joining and leaving.
Various settings are available in `Settings - Audio - Players Instance Notifier` menu entry.
More information can be found [here](https://github.com/SDraw/ml_mods_cvr/tree/master/ml_pin).
versions.changelog: - Switched game events from obsolete to new

versions.name: VisemeValue
versions.author: Nirvash
versions.description:
This mod writes your current viseme state to parameters for use in avatars. (Much like the Parameter Stream for Viseme Loudness, but with the viseme shape)

Options for:
* Driving 'VisemeMod_Value' or 'Viseme' with an int 0-14 for the current viseme
* Driving individual parameters 'VisemeMod_xx' (float) for all possible visemes 0-14 (sil must exist)

*You will need a Face Mesh defined and Use Lip Sync checked. You do not need any visemes selected*

See <https://github.com/Nirv-git/CVRMods-Nirv/blob/main/VisemeValue/README.md> for full details

versions.name: EzCurls
versions.author: NotAKidoS
versions.description:
A mod that allows you to tune your finger curls to your liking. Supposedly can help with VR sign language, as raw finger curls are not that great for quick and precise gestures.

The settings are not too coherent, it is mostly a bunch of things thrown at the wall, but it works for me. I hope it works for you too.

versions.name: PersonalGravity
versions.author: Nirvash
versions.description:
This mod provides options for controlling your own gravity locally!    
   
 - Gravity control options,   
	 - Towards a world space coordinate   
		 - Y+, Y- (Normally down), X+, X-, Z+, Z-   
	 - Surface normal of a raycast hit onto a collider, setting the gravity direction to match the angle of the collider.   
		 - Desktop: Raycast out from your camera    
		 - VR: Raycast out from your right hand in VR   
			 - Click your trigger to select and press both grips to cancel   
	 - Based off the direction you are currently looking      
	 
> Before anyone asks, no this is not intended to bypass any world   
> restrictions. The mod only functions in worlds that allow Flight or   
> Props, and gravity effecting objects is only allowed in worlds that   
> allow Props. Nothing this mod does is more than what a prop can do.

versions.name: FlightBinding
versions.author: Nirvash
versions.description:
Adds a SteamVR binding for toggling flight on/off. 
  You will need to go into your bindings in SteamVR and assign it.

versions.name: Fix_RotationBlockedAvatar
versions.author: Nirvash
versions.description:
Fixes the rotation of blocked avatars, mainly when they are not standing upright.
   
A toggle to enable/disable the mod is available in the UIX Mod Settings

versions.name: FadeBlockedAvatar
versions.author: Nirvash
versions.description:
This mod allows you to set the Blocked Avatar Robot to be transparent along with tinting the color per user. This allows you to more easily differentiate users and makes the robot less in your face.
   
Options are available in the UIX Mod Settings:

versions.name: NavMeshTools
versions.author: kafeijao
versions.description:
Simple library that allows to bake NavMeshes in Runtime.

Check [README.md](https://github.com/kafeijao/Kafe_CVR_Mods/tree/master/NavMeshTools) for more in-depth info.

versions.name: NavMeshFollower
versions.author: kafeijao
versions.description:
Simple mod that allows to control a prop nav mesh agent.

Check [README.md](https://github.com/kafeijao/Kafe_CVR_Mods/tree/master/NavMeshFollower) for more in-depth info.

versions.name: BTKSAUtils
versions.author: DDAkebono
versions.description:
BTK Standalone: Utils is a collection of smaller mods and tweaks that I've had kicking around!

The main features of this mod are:
- Hide nameplates on friends only
- Toggle nameplate visibility on a per user basis
- Access fade start and end settings for the new CVR nameplate shader
- Gesture Parameter Driver, this allows you to use the CVR Gesture Recognizer to control avatar parameters
- Alternate Advanced Avatars tab, this is a UILib based advanced avatars tab
- Avatar Parameter Interpolation, this smooths out float parameters from other users!

You can check out the main [README.md](https://github.com/ddakebono/BTKSAUtils/blob/main/README.md) on GitHub for more info!
versions.changelog:
Changes:

- Fixed GestureParamDriver issues with CVR r175 hotfix 2
- Fixed null reference exception when player leaves instance

versions.name: BetterFingersTracking
versions.author: SDraw
versions.description:
Overhauls behaviour of fingers tracking by using SteamVR skeletal input interface in a better way.
Corresponding settings are available in `Settings - Input & Key-Bindings - Better Fingers Tracking` menu section.

versions.name: BBCFryer
versions.author: Shin
versions.description: This mod allows you to modify voice settings. Currently it modifies the Bitrate of your voice, It also has an avatar parameter for **Bitrate**, Default = 1, XBOX360 = 2, VIVOX = 3.

versions.name: VoiceConnectionStatus
versions.author: Nirvash
versions.description:
This mod adds a few features around your current Voice Connection Status to Better Better Communications

* Set Parameter 'VoiceConnectionStatus' on Avatar to True/False (Default On)
  * If it exists this will toggle the parameter 'VoiceConnectionStatus' on your avatar when you connect or disconnect to the voice servers
* Play sound locally (Default On)
  * Locally plays a .wav file on Connect and Disconnect to make it more obvious for yourself when the state changes
    * You can replace the sfx in `ChilloutVR/ChilloutVR_Data/StreamingAssets/Cohtml/UIResources/GameUI/mods/VoiceConnectionStatus/audio` (Credit to NotAKidOnSteam for the code behind that)
* Send Chatbox Disconnect Message (Default On)
  * Sends a mod message via Chatbox to other users when you disconnect from voice
* Send Chatbox Connect Message (Default On)
    * Sends a mod message via Chatbox to other users when you connect to voice

versions.name: LucHeart.Spout
versions.author: LucHeart
versions.description: Adds Spout support for the portable camera and game view (your screen) into the game. This can be received via e.g. obs. Check [GitHub](https://github.com/LucHeart/CVR_Mods/tree/master/Spout) for more info

versions.name: ShadowCloneFallback
versions.author: NotAKidoS
versions.description:
Simple mod that exposes a toggle for the Fallback Shadow Clone implementation.
By default, using this mod will enable the less-performant shadow clones. Only use this mod if you for whatever reason have issues with the compute shader clones.

versions.name: StopClosingMyMenuOnWorldLoad
versions.author: NotAKidoS
versions.description:
Simple patch that prevents your menu from being closed when a world is loaded.
Nicked the patch Kafeijao made for my old MenuScalePatch mod.

versions.name: SwitchToDesktopOnSteamVRExit
versions.author: NotAKidoS
versions.description: Simple mod that initiates a VR Switch to Desktop when SteamVR is exited. By default, this is enabled, but can be disabled in the mod settings.

versions.name: MoreMenuOptions
versions.author: NotAKidoS
versions.description:
Exposes some menu options:
- Main Menu Scale Modifier
- Main Menu Distance Modifier
- Quick Menu World Anchor in VR

By default, the menu is adjusted to a more comfortable scale, but can be configured in the mod settings.

versions.name: MoreLogging
versions.author: Bluscream
versions.description:
Simple highly customizable `Mod` that logs

- HUD Notifications
- Instance Joins
- Player joins/leaves
- Prop Spawns
- ChatBox Messages

to your MelonLoader console and log

versions.name: CompanionProp
versions.author: kafeijao
versions.description:
Automatically spawn a single prop upon joining an instance (that allows props), while being able to optionally exclude them from being removed when pressing the Remove All Props or Remove my Props buttons.

You can start using by setting the prop Guid on the melon preferences. Either by editing the config file or by using the `UIExpansionKit` mod.

Check [README.md](https://github.com/kafeijao/Kafe_CVR_Mods/tree/master/CompanionProp) for more in-depth info.

versions.name: PublicSafety
versions.author: Bluscream
versions.description:
Simple `Mod` that allows you to auto-set certain settings like

- URL Whitelist
- Advanced Safety
- Discord/Steam Rich Presence

when you join public instances

If you have recommendations on other settings that should be included, leave them on [Github](https://github.com/Bluscream/cvr-mods/issues/new) or [Discord](https://discord.com/users/467777925790564352)

versions.name: PropSpawner
versions.author: Bluscream
versions.description:
Slightly less simple `Mod` that allows you to auto-spawn certain props when you join a instance

Check the [Github Readme](https://github.com/Bluscream/cvr-mods/blob/master/PropSpawner/README.md) for more infos.

versions.name: MoreChatNotifications
versions.author: Bluscream
versions.description:
Simple `Mod` that allows you to send additional notifications to other players via the ChatBox mod like
- World Download Percentage
- Instance Switching
- Instance Rejoining
- Flight Mode Switching
- VR Mode Switching
- FBT Switching
- Seated Mode Switching
- Muting/Unmuting
- Voice Status
- Invite/Friend request recieved
versions.changelog:
- Fixed FBTModeSwitchNotificationsTemplateHalfBody not properly displaying
+ Add FlightModeSwitchNotification
+ Added SeatedModeSwitchNotification
+ Added InviteNotification

versions.name: VRModeSwitchHotkey
versions.author: Bluscream
versions.description: Simple `Mod` that allows you to switch between VR/Desktop mode with a simple configurable modifier+hotkey combo (works with virtual keyboards)

versions.name: RelativeSync
versions.author: NotAKidoS
versions.description:
Relative sync for Movement Parent & Chairs. Requires both users to have the mod installed. Synced over Mod Network.

Provides some Experimental settings to also fix local jitter on movement parents.
versions.changelog:
- Fixed log spam when receiving relative sync data from a blocked user (thanks Mod Network for still forwarding that data -_-)
- Adjusted execution order to apply relative sync before Totally Wholesomes LineController
- Adjusted Relative Sync to still apply to avatar distance-hidden users
- Adjusted Relative Sync to not apply if the CVRSeat or Movement Parent is disabled on receiving client

versions.name: MPUIWhitelist
versions.author: Shin
versions.description: This mod allows you to use MPUIKit on props, this also solves the issue of <https://feedback.abinteractive.net/p/2024r176ex1-modern-procedural-ui-kit-is-not-whitelisted-in-props>

versions.name: CVR-PlayTogether
versions.author: Searaphim
versions.description:
CVR-PlayTogether is a ChilloutVR Mod that aims to reproduce a Couch Gaming / Lan Party experience in VR.
It does so by Hosting/Streaming one's game (and inputs) with friends of your choosing and displaying that on a shared `physical` Screen spawned in-game via a special prop.

Visit [CCK-PlayTogether's GitHub'](https://github.com/Searaphim/CCK-PlayTogether) to get the prop.
More info on [CVR-PlayTogether's GitHub Readme](https://github.com/Searaphim/CVR-PlayTogether/blob/master/README.md)
For support, feedback and everything else: [Join the Discord](https://discord.gg/xmSjEEqTw8)

versions.name: LazyPrune
versions.author: NotAKidoS
versions.description:
Prevents loaded objects from immediately unloading on destruction. Should prevent needlessly unloading & reloading all avatars/props on world rejoin or GS reconnection.

Unused objects are pruned after 3 minutes, or when loading into a different world.
versions.changelog:
- Fixed killtime check, would needlessly check known non-eligible objects for pruning.
- Moved away from using GameEventSystem as it proved unreliable for tracking remote Avatar destruction, now patching Object Loader directly as loadedObject is not assigned when object wrappers are enabled.
- Fixed scheduled prune job being nuked as it was created before initial scene load.
- Patched two race conditions in the game that would cause the object loader to lock up.

versions.name: ReconnectionSystemFix
versions.author: NotAKidoS
versions.description: Prevents recreating and reloading all remote players & avatars during a reconnection event.

versions.name: AASDefaultProfileFix
versions.author: NotAKidoS
versions.description:
Fixes the Default AAS profile not being applied when loading into an avatar without a profile selected.

By default, the game will not apply anything and the avatar will default to the state found within the Controller parameters.

versions.name: DropPropTweak
versions.author: NotAKidoS
versions.description: Gives the Drop Prop button more utility by allowing you to drop props in the air.

versions.name: IKSimulatedRootAngleFix
versions.author: NotAKidoS
versions.description: Fixes a small issue with Desktop & HalfBody root angle being incorrectly calculated while on rotating Movement Parents. If you've ever noticed your body/feet insisting on facing opposite of the direction you are rotating, this fixes that.

versions.name: ScrollFlight
versions.author: NotAKidoS
versions.description: Scroll-wheel to adjust flight speed in Desktop. Stole idea from Luc.

versions.name: PropLoadingHexagon
versions.author: Exterrata & NotAKidoS
versions.description:
Adds a hexagon indicator to downloading props. Indicator is styled to look similar to Portals.

Can use Delete Mode on loading hexagons to cancel stuck downloads. Setting is provided to display the hexagon for Blocked/Filtered props.

versions.name: VisualCloneFix
versions.author: NotAKidoS
versions.description:
Fixes the Visual Clone system and allows you to use it again.

Using the Visual Clone should be faster than the default Head Hiding & Shadow Clones, but will add a longer hitch on initial avatar load.

**NOTE:** The Visual Clone is still an experimental feature that was temporarily removed in [ChilloutVR 2024r175 Hotfix 1](https://abinteractive.net/blog/chilloutvr_2024r175_hotfix_1), so there may be bugs or issues with it.
versions.changelog:
- Fixed FPRExclusions IsShown state being inverted when toggled.
- Fixed head FPRExclusion generation not checking for existing exclusion.
- Sped up FindExclusionVertList by 100x by not being an idiot. This heavily reduces avatar hitch with Visual Clone active.

versions.name: KeepVelocityOnExitFlight
versions.author: NotAKidoS
versions.description: Keeps the player's velocity when exiting flight mode. Makes it possible to fling yourself like in Garry's Mod.

versions.name: ASTExtension
versions.author: NotAKidoS
versions.description:
Extension mod for [Avatar Scale Tool](https://github.com/NotAKidoS/AvatarScaleTool):
- VR Gesture to scale
- Persistent height
- Copy height from others

Best used with Avatar Scale Tool, but will attempt to work with found scaling setups.
Requires already having Avatar Scaling on the avatar. This is **not** Universal Scaling.
versions.changelog:
- Fixed an issue where the parameter calibration process would sometimes result in the mouth pointer being misplaced when generated.
- Fixed IsGripping check for Knuckles controllers not requiring *both* hands as intended.

versions.name: HeadLookLockingInputFix
versions.author: NotAKidoS
versions.description: Fixes a bug where pressing the independent head look key (ALT) while in VR with the game window focused and a menu open would disable input and soft-lock you.

versions.name: CVR_DECtalk
versions.author: Herp Derpinstine
versions.description: Allows you to use DECtalk voices for Text-To-Speech
versions.changelog: Fixed an issue with Sharing Violation during Native Library extraction

versions.name: AvatarQueueSystemTweaks
versions.author: NotAKidoS
versions.description:
Small tweaks to the Avatar Queue System.

- Prioritize loading own avatar over others.
- Prioritize loading friends' avatars over others.
- Load avatars by distance from player.

versions.name: DataFeed
versions.author: NovaVoidHowl
versions.description: This mod provides a Data Feed of additional parameters from ChilloutVR.

versions.name: CustomSpawnPoint
versions.author: NotAKidoS
versions.description: Replaces the unused Images button in the World Details page with a button to set a custom spawn point.
versions.changelog: - Removed unneeded logging when opening a World Details page.

versions.name: AMDQuestWirelessStutterFix
versions.author: kafeijao
versions.description:
Simple mod that possibly fixes the stutter when using Quest Wireless on an AMD GPU.

Check [README.md](https://github.com/kafeijao/Kafe_CVR_Mods/tree/master/AMDQuestWirelessStutterFix) for more in-depth info.

versions.name: VRCFT2CVR.Plugin
versions.author: 200Tigersbloxed
versions.description: Runs VRCFaceTracking v5.2.3.0 natively without needing OSC (no VRCFT app). You can find a list of modules and more information in the [README](https://github.com/200Tigersbloxed/VRCFT2CVR/blob/main/README.md)

versions.name: VideoPlayerExtensions
versions.author: 200Tigersbloxed
versions.description: Adds extra controls and features for Video Players

versions.name: Stickers
versions.author: NotAKidoS, SketchFoxsky
versions.description:
Stickers! Allows you to place small images on any surface. Requires both users to have the mod installed. Synced over Mod Network.

Limitations:
- Image should be under 256KB in size.
- Image dimensions should be a power of 2 (e.g. 512x512, 1024x1024).
  - If the image exceeds the size limit or is not a power of 2 the mod will automatically resize it.
  - The automatic resizing may result in loss of quality (or may just fail), so it is recommended to resize the image yourself before placing it in the `UserData/Stickers/` folder.

-# More information can be found on the [README](https://github.com/NotAKidoS/NAK_CVR_Mods/blob/main/Stickers/README.md).
versions.changelog:
- Added world restriction via `[DisableStickers]` GameObject (thx Sketch).
- Added sticker placement preview.
- Fixed stickers being hit by VR switch shader replacement.
- Fixed Desktop Sticker placement bind firing when a text field was focused.
- **This version is not backwards compatible with previous versions over network.**

versions.name: SmartReticle
versions.author: NotAKidoS
versions.description: Simple mod that makes the Desktop/VR Head reticle only appear when hovering over an interactable, holding an interaction button, or when using a tool.
versions.changelog: - Adjusted to also work for the VR head reticle.

versions.name: WhereAmIPointing
versions.author: NotAKidoS
versions.description: Simple mod that makes your controller rays always visible when the menus are open. Useful for when you're trying to aim at something in the distance. Also visualizes which ray is being used for menu interaction.
versions.changelog: - Fixed line renderer alpha not being reset when the menu is closed.

versions.name: MenuCSSLoader
versions.author: kafeijao & Jill The Something
versions.description:
Allows loading CSS files into the MainMenu or QuickMenu with theme selection. This happens in runtime, so no files need to be replaced.

To load CSS files put them on the following folders:
- `ChilloutVR\UserData\MenuCSSLoader\Default\MainMenu\`
- `ChilloutVR\UserData\MenuCSSLoader\Default\QuickMenu\`

Theme Repositories:
- <https://github.com/jll123567/MenuCSSLoader-Themes/releases/latest>

To create a theme:
- Create a folder in `ChilloutVR\UserData\MenuCSSLoader\` with your theme name
- Put CSS files for the MainMenu in `<theme-name>\MainMenu`
- Put CSS files for the QuickMenu in `<theme-name>\QuickMenu`

-# Check [README.md](https://github.com/kafeijao/Kafe_CVR_Mods/tree/master/MenuCSSLoader) for more in-depth info.
